title: Mobile-Based Formative Assessment Design for Continuing Medical Education Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in medical fields and foundational concepts of educational assessment
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, enabling real-time feedback and flexible learning schedules

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate assessment types (formative/summative) according to educational activity objectives with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can design five or more assessment questions for each cognitive, psychomotor, and affective domain.
Learners can establish a data collection system using triangulation techniques (surveys, quizzes, peer evaluations) in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
